roleset.name: decorate
roleset.note: GARNISH-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from garnish.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: She had garnished her dish with a sprinkling of finely chopped chives.
example.arg: with a sprinkling of finely chopped chives

roleset.name: withold or extort
roleset.note: GARNISH-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from garnish.02-v)

example.name: Withhold
example.text: His employer garnished his wages in order to pay his debt.
example.arg: in order to pay his debt

example.name: Extort
example.text: Kettering Automotive owner of kettering automotive garnished 410 dollars out of my check cause I quit do to being sick.
example.arg: Kettering Automotive owner of kettering automotive
cause I quit do to being sick
